name: Galaxy S7 edge
description: he beauty of what we've engineered is to give you the slimmest feel in your hand without compromising the big screen size. And the elegantly curved front and back fit in your palm just right. It's as beautiful to look at, as it is to use.

name: Lumia 950 XL Dual SIM
description: Available in space gray, silver, gold, and rose gold, iPhone 6s features an A9 chip, 3D Touch, Touch ID, a 12MP camera, and iOS 10.

name: iPhone 7
description: Available in jet black,1 black, silver, gold, and rose gold, iPhone 7 features an all-new 12MP camera; splash, water, and dust resistance; an A10 Fusion chip; a new Retina HD display with wide color; stereo speakers; and iOS 10.

name: galaxy-note-5
description: Bigger has always been better. Galaxy Note proved that time and again. It also changed the entire game with S Pen. A versatile tool for ideas, goals and dreams. This time it's Galaxy Note5. The most powerful and beautiful version to date.
